snippet.title: [ Library of Ruina ] Official Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
"May you find your book in this place."

Combat between the guests and the librarians breaks out as if it were on a stage. Defeated guests turn into books, and the Library grows onward. And eventually, get your hands on… The one singular, perfect book.

Turn Based RPG / Deck Building / Story Based

Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1256670/Library_Of_Ruina/
Xbox: https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/p/library-of-ruina/9pld3nb588zl?activetab=pivot:overviewtab

Twitter: https://twitter.com/ProjMoonStudio
